definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: True, the peasants are in a sense " unruly" in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 的確的，農民在鄉里頗有一點子“亂來”。

sentences.english: This protects us from being severely hurt by uncontrolled sexual activity.
sentences.chinese: 這就是要保護我們避免受亂來性行爲的嚴重傷害。

sentences.english: Freeze, don't make him to lose too much blood.
sentences.chinese: 別亂來，不要讓他失血太多。

sentences.english: There's no king, the queen does fuck all and the blacks never follow the rules.
sentences.chinese: 沒有王，女王啥事兒也不幹，然後黑子不守規矩亂來。

sentences.english: While wars could be won or lost, no ruling class could be completely irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭雖有勝負，但任何統治階級都不能完全亂來。

sentences.english: Freeze: don't make him to lose too much hold.
sentences.chinese: 別亂來，不要讓他失血太多。

sentences.english: The things I interest in are more than I can handle, time forbids me doing these.
sentences.chinese: 我想做的嘢太多，但喺時間卻不容許我亂來。

definition: to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
to do what one is told/obedient
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
